openGraph.title: Python App Development Course | Coding Blocks
openGraph.description: This course will revolve around the concepts of Python, ranging from basic to advanced concepts and development of applications using this powerful language.

header.heading: Python App Development
header.subHeading: Programming Fundamentals and Web apps in Python

overview.content:
The Python Application Development course is designed to help students new to programming or otherwise to learn python from ground up to level of making interesting web applications. The first part of the course help students to understand how python syntax works, related concepts and the latter part deals with automating mundane tasks using python. Through this course, students will be made comfortable with python for computations, object-oriented python, python standard template library, databases and web application.

This course includes multiple activities through which students will have hands-on experience of python programming. Students will be aligned with a mentor who will guide them throughout the course. This course enables students to learn data Science, Machine Learning or web development using Django in future.

courseHighlights.title: Fundamentals
courseHighlights.content: We have designed our course keeping in mind the requirements of beginners.Course starts with fundamentals of logic building and problem solving.

courseHighlights.title: OOP Concepts
courseHighlights.content: Emphasis is given on building strong Object Oriented Programming Concepts and coding practices followed in the Software Industry, so to make our students industry-ready.

courseHighlights.title: Database ORM
courseHighlights.content: We cover relational databases as, Databases are most crucial part of application development as all the data related to objects of app need to be stored and queried in efficient way.

courseHighlights.title: Web Apps
courseHighlights.content: We take a deep dive into Python's extensive built in standard library and use them to make feature efficient Web applications.

courseContents.title: Getting started with Python
points: Setting up Python on windows, mac, linux

courseContents.title: Intermediate Python
points: Basic Python modules (time, datetime, random, os, sys, collections, etc)

courseContents.title: Python for web
points: Interacting with web APIs (GET and POST requests)
Web scraping using requests and BeautifulSoup

courseContents.title: Web development using Flask
points: Integrating SQL and Non-SQL databases to Flask app

faqs.ans: Anybody who wants to learn programming in Python from scratch, or those who wish to form a solid understanding of Python to pursue Data Science, Machine Learning, or other courses that require it should take this course. This course has no prerequisites.

faqs.ques: I know C, C++, or Java should I do this course?
faqs.ans: This course will cover programming principles from scratch using Python. If you already know one of the aforementioned programming languages, it will only be easier for you to pick up the concepts taught in the course, but knowledge is in no way a prerequisite.

faqs.ques: Will this help me in making web apps?
faqs.ans: This course is designed to give you a solid foundation in programming wrapped up with Web Application Development. It will help you discover further with Web Development, Data Science, and other fields.

syallabus.title: Getting started with Python
sectionContent: Setting up Python on windows, mac, linux

syallabus.title: Intermediate Python
sectionContent: Basic Python modules (time, datetime, random, os, sys, collections, etc)

syallabus.title: System Programming
sectionContent: Interact with the system using Python
I/O Streams and Parallel Programming in Python

syallabus.title: Python for Web
sectionContent: Interacting with web APIs (GET and POST requests)
Web scraping using requests and BeautifulSoup

syallabus.title: Web development using Flask
sectionContent: Integrating SQL and Non-SQL databases to Flask app

mentors.name: Manu S Pillai
mentors.description: Manu is a Deep Learning Researcher and an avid python programmer. He has multiple research papers published in international conferences and journals. His interest lies in Computer Vision and is currently doing independant research in the same domain. He has also won multiple hackathons including Smart Odisha Hackathon and was awarded by the Chief Minister ot Odisha, Shri Naveen Patnaik. He can be found at www.manuspillai.in.

mentors.name: Princey Yadav
mentors.description: Princey is a post graduate from IIIT Delhi and did her graduation from NSIT Delhi. She joined Coding Blocks due to her passion for teaching. She has prior experience as a Software Engineer and has done research in the field of Computational Biology. Her interests include Machine learning, Data science and Game development. She is a pythonista and likes to draw and watch anime for fun.
